title: About Rrish
subtitle: Passionate Educator. Blues Improviser. Musical Guide.
content: Music has been my constant companion for over 5 years. What started as a personal journey into blues improvisation has evolved into a deep passion for both performing and helping others discover their own musical voice.

Based in Melbourne, I specialize in guitar improvisation with a focus on blues foundations while drawing from pop, rock, and acoustic styles. My performance experience across Melbourne's live music scene enriches my teaching approach, bringing real-world musical insight into every lesson.

With 1 year of teaching experience and regular performance engagements across Melbourne venues, I bridge the gap between technical skill development and authentic musical expression. Whether I'm performing for audiences or guiding students, my focus remains the same: helping everyone discover that music is a language we can all speak.
My role as both performer and educator allows me to offer students a unique perspective - not just how to play music, but how to communicate through it, whether in a practice room or on stage.
